DCMI Format Vocabulary XML Schema
Created 2013-01-01
Created by
Eric Weig (eweig@email.uky.edu)
This schema defines a simpleFormat which enumerates the allowable values for the DCMI Format Vocabulary for the Kentucky Digital Library. These are a subset selected from the Art & Architecture Thesaurus (ATT) aside from one local term '[mixed materials]'. This term is an attempt on our part to allow for the format identification of archival materials of a mixed nature, such as a folder full of materials in a collection digitized at the folder level only.

xs:enumeration.value: Art (fine art) or visual arts [or include this in images]
